name: Melting Matt
description:
Melting Matt is a Point and Click Platformer, where your goal is to protect robot who is constantly trying to kill itself. 

You can move and rotate different platforms to keep Matt alive.

Controls:

A and D - to move your camera

R- to restart

Space - make Matt jump every 10 seconds

Mouse - to move different platforms

Made in three days for Wowie game jam 4.0 by two beginner game devs
